title: Noun collection 2
sentences: Have you read the newspaper today?
How will the weather be next weekend?
We are planning a long journey to Asia.
When are you taking your next vacation?
The train arrives at the station on time.
My flight starts tomorrow at the Frankfurt airport.
Can you show me the map on your phone?
Ich möchte am Abend einen spannenden
I want to watch an exciting movie in the evening.
That is a beautiful gift for your sister.
Do you have enough money for the ticket?
I have to pack my clothes for the trip.
im Garten sieht sehr süß aus.
The animal in the garden looks very cute.
We often go for a walk in the park.
I like swimming in the blue sea.
The forest is especially beautiful in autumn.
Do you have an answer to my question?
That is a big problem for all of us.
Where did you put the key?
I need more light to read.
Do you know the way to the museum?
Many thanks for your help with the move.
Wir haben leider nicht mehr viel
Unfortunately, we don't have much time left.
Ich schicke Ihnen heute noch ein
I am sending you a picture of the house today.
The world is full of surprises.
dictionary:
die Zeitung - newspaper
das Wetter - weather
die Reise - journey / trip
der Urlaub - vacation / holiday
der Bahnhof - train station
der Flughafen - airport
die Karte - map / card
der Film - movie / film
das Geschenk - gift / present
das Geld - money
die Kleidung - clothes
das Tier - animal
der Park - park
das Meer - sea
der Wald - forest
die Nachricht - message / news
die Antwort - answer
das Problem - problem
der Schlüssel - key
das Licht - light
der Weg - way / path
die Hilfe - help
die Zeit - time
das Bild - picture / image
die Welt - world
